entry.dcterms:title: Hungarian Central Statistical Office (KSH) Dwelling History Survey 1982. Conditions of getting a dwelling in Hungary.
entry.dcterms:creator: Merkl, Ildikó
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-A96: Hungarian Central Statistical Office (KSH) Dwelling History Survey 1982. Conditions of getting a dwelling in Hungary.. data sheet. Version: 2007-01-19
entry.dcterms:creator: Farkas, János
entry.dcterms:contributor: Hungarian Central Statistical Office Department of Social Statistics
entry.dcterms:subject: 2004-02-00: the labels of the data file are corrected and complemented
entry.dcterms:description: personal data of the people living in the dwelling, data of the present and previous dwelling of the family head; the way the head of family got into the present dwelling: construction, allocation, purchase, inheritance, exchange; situation and plans of the head of family and the second family living in the dwelling; housing history of the people sharing the same dwelling
